experimental::awaitable_operators::operator &&

Wait for both operations to succeed. 

template<
    typename Executor>
awaitable< void, Executor > operator &&(
    awaitable< void, Executor > t,
    awaitable< void, Executor > u);
  » more...

    typename U,
    typename Executor>

    awaitable< void, Executor > t,
    awaitable< U, Executor > u);
  » more...
